Configuration properties

properties.label: HARBOR_HOST
properties.description: The address of harbor service

properties.label: QS_ACCESS
properties.description: Provide the accesskey to connect QingStor for storing Image data

properties.label: QS_SECRET
properties.description: Provide the secretkey to connect QingStor for storing Image data

properties.label: QS_BUCKET
properties.description: Provide the bucket name to use

properties.label: QS_ROOT_DIRECTORY
properties.description: The root direcotry or prefix for Harbor image storage

properties.label: QS_ZONE
properties.description: Provide the zone of bucket to use

properties.label: QS_URL
properties.description: Provide the Address of QingStor

properties.label: REGISTRY_READONLY
properties.description: Turn on readonly mode,only allow pull action
